nodes.text: How to Read an Imperial Intelligence Scandoc

How to Read an Imperial Intelligence Scandoc is a short narrative written by Greg Gorden for the Imperial Sourcebook, originally published in October 1989 for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It relays instructions on how to read Scandocs made by Imperial Intelligence, including an example of a fully secured scandoc decoded in the form of a memo from Pouquor Elegin to Murtan Andes, as well as what various terms mean in a document.
